nodes.text: Woodoo were a species of nesting creature found on the planet Tatooine. The child of two miners living in a homestead near Mos Entha could hear the calls of nesting woodoo during the otherwise silent nights at the homestead.

Woodoo were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2019 Star Wars: Choose Your Destiny mini-adventure Choose Your Destiny: An Escape Mission, which was written by Cavan Scott. The species originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where they first appeared in the 2001 reference book The Wildlife of Star Wars: A Field Guide, which was written by Terryl Whitlatch and Bob Carrau.
